##### Add role to user

1. Click **{{< fa plus >}}** to open the Assign Roles menu for that user.

1. Click **{{< fa plus >}}** next to the role for each role to be assigned.

1. Click **{{< fa puzzle-piece >}} Assign Roles to User** to save changes.
